DOC.detailed_description: National sentinel surveillance data show HIV infection increase fast among men sex men ( MSM ) China . In city HIV prevalence among MSM high 10 % .It urgent China explore innovative intervention reduce HIV/AIDS transmission among population . The purpose study : 1 . To evaluate effectiveness comprehensive intervention decrease HIV/STIs incidence among MSM population China . The comprehensive intervention component include male circumcision , POL intervention , HIV test counsel condom promotion . 2 . To determine acceptability male circumcision among MSM population China .
